user_story: As a customer, I want to be able to view the nutritional information and allergen information for each menu item so that I can make informed choices.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall display nutritional information for each menu item, including but not limited to calories, fat, carbohydrates, and protein.

2. The system shall display allergen information for each menu item, including but not limited to common allergens such as gluten, nuts, dairy, and soy.

3. The system shall allow customers to filter menu items based on specific dietary needs or restrictions, such as gluten-free or nut-free.

4. The system shall ensure that nutritional and allergen information is up-to-date and synchronized with the menu items in real-time.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall display nutritional information for each menu item, including but not limited to calories, fat, carbohydrates, and protein.

2. The system shall display allergen information for each menu item, including but not limited to common allergens such as gluten, nuts, dairy, and soy.

3. The system shall allow customers to filter menu items based on specific dietary needs or restrictions, such as gluten-free or nut-free.

4. The system shall ensure that nutritional and allergen information is up-to-date and synchronized with the menu items in real-time.
